13006064	Ouinge mwet Israel elos sang acn sin mwet Levi tuh elos in muta we , wi acn tupasrpasr nien mongo lun kosro ma raunela acn ingan . (
13006065	Siti srisrik in acn lal Judah , Simeon , ac Benjamin ma fwack tari lucng itukyang pac ke susfa . )
13006066	Inen siti srisrik in acn lal Ephraim ma itukyang nu sin kutu sou in sou lulap lal Kohath wi acn tupasrpasr nien mongo lun kosro pa inge :
13006067	Shechem , su siti in molela in acn fineol uh in Ephraim , oayapa Gezer ,
13006068	Jokmeam , Beth Horon ,
13006069	Aijalon , ac Gath Rimmon .
13006070	In acn lun Tafun Manasseh Roto , itukyang nu selos siti srisrik luo inge , Aner ac Bileam , wi acn tupasrpasr nien mongo lun kosro ma raunela acn ingan .
13006071	Itukyang nu sin sou in sou lulap lal Gershon siti srisrik inge wi acn tupasrpasr ma raunela : Ke acn lun Tafun Manasseh Kutulap : Golan in Bashan , ac Ashtaroth .
13006072	Liki acn lun Issachar : Kedesh , Daberath ,
13006073	Ramoth , ac Anem .
13006074	Liki acn lun Asher : Mashal , Abdon ,
13006075	Hukok , ac Rehob .
13006076	Liki acn lun Naphtali : Kedesh in Galilee , Hammon , ac Kiriathaim .
13006077	Ac nu sin sou lula in sou lulap lal Merari , pa inge siti srisrik ac acn tupasrpasr nien mongo lun kosro ma itukyang nu selos : Liki acn lal Zebulun : Rimmono ac Tabor .
13006078	Liki acn lal Reuben , kutulap in Infacl Jordan sasla acn Jericho : Bezer , su oan acn fulat ma tupasrpasr fac , oayapa Jahzah ,
13006079	Kedemoth , ac Mephaath .
13006080	Liki acn lal Gad : Ramoth in Gilead , Mahanaim ,
13006081	Heshbon , ac Jazer .
13007001	Oasr wen akosr natul Issachar : elos pa Tola , Puah , Jashub , ac Shimron .
13007002	Oasr wen onkosr natul Tola : elos pa Uzzi , Rephaiah , Jeriel , Jahmai , Ibsam , ac Shemuel . Elos inge sifen kais sie sou in sou lulap lal Tola , ac elos mwet mweun pweng-peng . In wel lal Tokosra David ah , pisalos oasr ke longoul luo tausin onfoko .
13007003	Oasr wen sefanna natul Uzzi : inel pa Izrahiah . Izrahiah ac wen akosr natul inge : Michael , Obadiah , Joel , ac Isshiah , elos kewa sifen kais sie sou .
13007004	Ke sripen pus mutan kialos ac tulik natulos , oru elos mukena ku in srukak pisen mwet mweun tolngoul onkosr tausin .
13007005	In ma simusla ke sou nukewa in sruf lal Issachar , oasr mukul oalngoul itkosr tausin su fal matwalos ac akola in wi mweun .
13007006	Oasr wen tolu natul Benjamin : elos pa Bela , Becher , ac Jediael .
13007007	Oasr wen limekosr natul Bela : elos pa Ezbon , Uzzi , Uzziel , Jerimoth , ac Iri . Elos sifen sou in sou lulap lalos , ac elos mwet mweun pwengpeng . Oasr longoul luo tausin tolngoul akosr mukul inmasrlolos su fal matwalos ac akola in wi mweun .
13007008	Oasr wen eu natul Becher : elos pa Zemirah , Joash , Eliezer , Eleoenai , Omri , Jeremoth , Abijah , Anathoth , ac Alemeth .
13007009	In ma simusla ke sou lalos , oasr mukul longoul tausin luofoko inmasrlolos su fal matwalos ac akola in wi mweun .
13007010	Oasr wen sefanna natul Jediael : el pa Bilhan . Oasr wen itkosr natul Bilhan : elos pa Jeush , Benjamin , Ehud , Chenaanah , Zethan , Tarshish , ac Ahishahar .
13007011	Elos sifen sou lalos in sou lulap lalos uh , oayapa elos mwet mweun pwengpeng . Oasr mukul singoul itkosr tausin luofoko inmasrlolos su fal matwalos ac akola in wi mweun .
13007012	Shuppim ac Huppim eltal ma pac in sruf se inge . Oasr wen sefanna natul Dan : el pa Hushim .
13007013	Oasr wen akosr natul Naphtali : elos pa Jahziel , Guni , Jezer , ac Shallum . ( Elos tuku kacl Bilhah me . )
13007014	Oasr wen luo natul Manasseh sin mutan kulansap se kial , su sie mutan Aram : elos pa Ariel ac Machir . Machir pa papa tumal Gilead .
13007015	Machir el konauk sie mutan kial Huppim ac sie kial Shuppim . Inen tamtael se lal Machir pa Maacah . Inen wen se akluo natul Machir pa Zelophehad , a tulik mutan na pa natul Zelophehad .
13007016	Maacah , mutan kial Machir , el oswela wen luo , ac eltal sang inelos Peresh ac Sheresh . Oasr wen luo natul Peresh : elos pa Ulam ac Rakem ,
13007017	na oasr wen se natul Ulam , su inel pa Bedan . Mwet inge nukewa ma in fwil natul Gilead , wen natul Machir , su wen natul Manasseh .
13007018	Oasr wen tolu natul Hammolecheth , tamtael lal Gilead : elos pa Ishod , Abiezer , ac Mahlah . (
13007019	Oasr wen akosr natul Shemida : elos pa Ahian , Shechem , Likhi , ac Aniam . )
13007020	Pa inge fwil natul Ephraim , fwil nu ke fwil : Shuthelah , Bered , Tahath , Eleadah , Tahath ,
13007021	Zabad , Shuthelah . Oasr wen luo pac natul Ephraim sayal Shuthelah : elos pa Ezer ac Elead . Anwuki eltal ke sripen eltal tuh srike in pisre kosro nutin mwet su muta in acn Gath meet lukelos .
13007022	Papa tumaltal , Ephraim , el tuh asor kaclos ke len na pus , ac sou lal elos tuku nu yorol in akwoyal .
13007023	Na el sifil utyak nu yurin mutan kial , ac el pitutuyak ac oswela sie wen . Eltal sang inel Beriah , ke sripen mwe lokoalok ma sikyak nu sin sou sac .
13007024	Oasr acn se natul Ephraim su inel pa Sheerah . El pa musaeak Beth Horon Ten ac Beth Horon Lucng , oayapa acn Uzzen Sheerah .
13007025	Oasr pac wen se natul Ephraim : inel pa Rephah . Pa inge inen mwet in fwil natul Rephah , su takla fwil nu ke fwil : Resheph , Telah , Tahan ,
13007026	Ladan , Ammihud , Elishama ,
13007027	Nun , Joshua .
13007028	Acn ma elos sruokya ac oakwuki we an pa : Bethel ac inkul nukewa ma oan raunela , fahla nwe Naaran nu kutulap , ac fahla nwe Gezer nu roto , wi inkul nukewa ma oan raunela Gezer . Oayapa acn Shechem ac acn Ayyah , ac inkul nukewa ma oan raunela .
13007029	Fwil natul Manasseh pa leum ke siti inge : Beth Shan , Taanach , Megiddo ac Dor , wi inkul ma oan raunela . Acn inge nukewa pa acn ma mwet in fwil natul Joseph , wen natul Jacob , elos muta we .
13007030	Pa inge inen mwet in fwil natul Asher . Oasr wen akosr natul : elos pa Imnah , Ishvah , Ishvi , ac Beriah . Oasr acn se pac natul , pa Serah .
13007031	Oasr wen luo natul Beriah : elos pa Heber ac Malchiel . ( Malchiel pa musaeak siti se pangpang Birzaith . )
13007032	Oasr wen tolu natul Heber : elos pa Japhlet , Shomer , ac Hotham , ac oasr acn se pac natul , pa Shua .
13007033	Oayapa oasr wen tolu natul Japhlet : elos pa Pasach , Bimhal , ac Ashvath .
13007034	Oasr wen tolu natul Shomer , tamulel lal Japhlet : elos pa Rohgah , Jehubbah , ac Aram .
13007035	Oasr wen akosr natul Hotham , tamulel lal Japhlet : elos pa Zophah , Imna , Shelesh , ac Amal .
13007036	Inen mwet in fwil natul Zophah pa : Suah , Harnepher , Shual , Beri , Imrah ,
13007037	Bezer , Hod , Shamma , Shilshah , Ithran , ac Beera .
13007038	Inen mwet in fwil natul Jether pa : Jephunneh , Pispa , ac Ara .
13007039	Inen mwet in fwil natul Ulla pa : Arah , Hanniel , ac Rizia .
13007040	Mwet ingan nukewa ma in fwil natul Asher . Elos sifen kais sie sou ac elos mwet mweun pwengpeng , oayapa elos mwet kol su eteyuk . Inmasrlon mwet in fwil natul Asher , oasr mukul longoul onkosr tausin su fal matwalos ac akola in wi mweun .
13008001	Oasr wen limekosr natul Benjamin . Takin matwalos pa inge , matu nu ke srik : Bela , Ashbel , Aharah ,
13008002	Nohah , ac Rapha .
13008003	Fwil natul Bela pa : Addar , Gera , Abihud ,
13008004	Abishua , Naaman , Ahoah ,
13008005	Gera , Shephuphan , ac Huram .
13008006	Sifen kais sie sou in fwil natul Ehud su muta in Geba lillilyak elos , na elos som muta in sruoh in acn Manahath .
13008007	Elos pa : Naaman , Ahijah , ac Gera . Gera , su papa tumal Uzza ac Ahihud , pa kololos ke mukuila sac .
13008008	Shaharaim el sisla mutan luo kial : Hushim ac Baara . Tok ke el muta in facl Moab ,
13008009	el payuk nu sel Hodesh , su oswela wen itkosr natul : elos pa Jobab , Zibia , Mesha , Malcam ,
13008010	Jeuz , Sachia , ac Mirmah . Wen natul inge nufon elos sifen kais sie sou .
13008011	Oasr pac wen luo natul yorol Hushim : elos pa Abitub ac Elpaal .
13008012	Oasr wen tolu natul Elpaal : elos pa Eber , Misham , ac Shemed . Shemed pa musaela siti Ono ac Lod , oayapa inkul ma raunela acn ingan .
13008013	Beriah ac Shema pa sifen sou ma som twe oakwuki in siti Aijalon ac lusak mwet su muta in siti Gath .
13008014	Inen kutu mwet in fwil natul Beriah pa : Ahio , Shashak , Jeremoth ,
13008015	Zebadiah , Arad , Eder ,
13008016	Michael , Ishpah , ac Joha .
13008017	Inen kutu mwet in fwil natul Elpaal pa : Zebadiah , Meshullam , Hizki , Heber ,
13008018	Ishmerai , Izliah , ac Jobab .
13008019	Inen kutu mwet in fwil natul Shimei pa : Jakim , Zichri , Zabdi ,
13008020	Elienai , Zillethai , Eliel ,
13008021	Adaiah , Beraiah , ac Shimrath .
13008022	Inen kutu mwet in fwil natul Shashak pa : Ishpan , Eber , Eliel ,
13008023	Abdon , Zichri , Hanan ,
13008024	Hananiah , Elam , Anthothijah ,
13008025	Iphdeiah , ac Penuel .
13008026	Inen kutu mwet in fwil natul Jeroham pa : Shamsherai , Shehariah , Athaliah ,
13008027	Jaareshiah , Elijah , ac Zichri .
13008028	Pa ingan inen mwet su sifen kais sie sou oayapa mwet fulat in fwil lalos uh , su muta in Jerusalem .
13008029	Jeiel el musaela acn Gibeon ac oakwuki we . Inen mutan kial uh pa Maacah ,
13008030	ac wen se meet natul pa Abdon . Inen wen natul saya pa : Zur , Kish , Baal , Ner , Nadab ,
13008031	Gedor , Ahio , Zechariah ,
13008032	ac Mikloth , su papa tumal Shimeah . Fwil natulos uh muta Jerusalem apkuran nu yurin sou su ma pac in sou lulap lalos .
13008033	Ner pa papa tumal Kish , ac Kish pa papa tumal Tokosra Saul . Oasr wen akosr natul Saul : elos pa Jonathan , Malchishua , Abinadab , ac Ishbosheth .
13008034	Jonathan pa papa tumal Mephibosheth , su papa tumal Micah .
13008035	Oasr wen akosr natul Micah : elos pa Pithon , Melech , Tarea , ac Ahaz .
13008036	Ahaz pa papa tumal Jehoaddah , ac Jehoaddah pa papa tumun wen tolu : elos pa Alemeth , Azmaveth , ac Zimri . Zimri pa papa tumal Moza .
13008037	Moza pa papa tumal Binea , su papa tumal Raphah , su papa tumal Eleasah ; ac Eleasah pa papa tumal Azel .
13008038	Oasr wen onkosr natul Azel : elos pa Azrikam , Bocheru , Ishmael , Sheariah , Obadiah , ac Hanan .
13008039	Oasr wen tolu natul Eshek , tamulel lal Azel : elos pa Ulam , Jeush , ac Eliphelet .
13008040	Wen natul Ulam elos mwet mweun pwengpeng ac elos oalel ke pisr . Pisen wen natul ac wen pac natulos sun siofok lumngaul nufon . Mwet nukewa ma takinyukla inelos lucng ingan , elos ma in sruf lal Benjamin .
13009001	Mwet Israel nukewa simla inelos fal nu ke kais sie sou lalos , ac ma simusla inge oakwuk in Book In Tokosra Lun Israel . Mwet Judah tuh lillilyak som nu Babylon ke sripen ma koluk lalos .
13009002	Mwet su foloko emeet nu in siti selos tukun sruoh pa mwet tol , mwet Levi , mwet kulansap in Tem-pul ac mwet Israel pac saya .
13009003	Kutu mwet in sruf lal Judah , Benjamin , Ephraim , ac Manasseh elos som ac oakwuki in Jerusalem .
13009004	Uthai , wen natul Ammihud natul Omri , pa mwet kol lun mwet in fwil natul Perez , wen natul Judah . Inen luo sin papa matu tumal Uthai pa Imri ac Bani .
13009005	Asaiah , wen natul Judah , pa mwet kol lun mwet in fwil natul Shelah , wen natul Judah . Asaiah pa sifen sou lal uh .
13009006	Jeuel pa mwet kol lun fwil lal Zerah , wen natul Judah . Pisen sou in sruf lal Judah su muta Jerusalem pa sou onfoko eungoul .
13009007	Mwet takla ten inge elos ma in sruf lal Benjamin : Sallu , wen natul Meshullam , natul Hodaviah , natul Hassenuah
13009008	Ibneiah , wen natul Jeroham Elah , wen natul Uzzi , natul Michri Meshullam , wen natul Shephatiah , natul Reuel , natul Ibnijah
13009009	Sou eufoko lumngaul onkosr in sruf lal Benjamin pa muta Jerusalem . Mwet nukewa simla inelos lucng elos sifen sou .
13009010	Mwet tol inge elos muta Jerusalem : Jedaiah , Jehoiarib , ac Jachin
13009011	Azariah , wen natul Hilkiah ( su mwet pwapa fulat in Tempul ) ; inen kutu pac papa matu tumaltal pa Meshullam , Zadok , Meraioth , ac Ahitub
13009012	Adaiah , wen natul Jeroham ; inen kutu pac papa tumaltal pa Pashhur ac Malchijah Maasai , wen natul Adiel ; inen kutu pac papa tumaltal pa Jahzerah , Meshullam , Meshillemith , ac Immer
13009013	Pisen mwet tol su sifen sou pa mwet sie tausin itfoko onngoul . Mwet inge kewa elos arulana etu orekma nukewa ke Tempul .
13009014	Mwet Levi su muta Jerusalem pa : Shemaiah , wen natul Hasshub ; inen kutu pac papa tumaltal pa Azrikam ac Hashabiah , ke sou lulap lal Merari
13009015	Bakbakkar , Heresh , ac Galal Mattaniah , wen natul Mica ; inen kutu pac papa tumaltal pa Zichri ac Asaph
13009016	Obadiah , wen natul Shemaiah ; inen kutu pac papa tumaltal pa Galal ac Jeduthun Berechiah , wen natul Asa natul Elkanah , su muta ke acn lun siti srisrik Netophah
13009017	Pa inge inen mwet topang ke Tempul su muta in Jerusalem : Shallum , Akkub , Talmon , ac Ahiman . Shallum pa mwet kol lalos .
13009018	Meet , mwet ke sou lulap inge elos muta topang ke Mutunoa lun Tokosra , layen nu kutulap . Papa matu tumalos pa mwet topang ke nien utyak nu ke iwen aktuktuk lun mwet Levi uh .
13009019	Shallum , wen natul Kore natul Ebiasaph , wi mwet wial in sou lulap lal Korah , pa mwet topang ke nien utyak nu ke Lohm Nuknuk lun LEUM GOD , oana ke mwet matu lalos elos oru meet ke elos tuh liyaung iwen aktuktuk sin LEUM GOD .
13009020	Phineas , wen natul Eleazar , el tuh kololos ke sie pacl ah , ac LEUM GOD El welul .
13009021	Zechariah , wen natul Meshelemiah , el oayapa sie mwet topang ke mutunoa in Lohm Nuknuk Mutal sin LEUM GOD .
13009022	Mwet luofoko singoul luo pa suliyukla tuh elos in mwet topang ke nien utyak uh oayapa ke mutunpot uh . Simla inelos fal nu ke kais sie siti srisrik ma elos muta we . Tokosra David ac mwet palu Samuel pa oakiya tuh mwet matu lalos inge in fosrngakin orekma yohk sripa inge kunalos .
13009023	Mwet inge ac fwil natulos elos tafwelos in oru orekma lun mwet topang ke mutunpot lun Tempul .
13009024	Oasr mutunpot akosr : sie oan nget nu epang , sie nu eir , sie nu kutulap ac sie nu roto . Oasr sie mwet topang fulat ke kais sie mutunpot inge .
13009025	Sou lun mwet topang fulat inge elos muta ke acn ma fototo nu ke mutunpot kunalos , na elos ac tuku eis pacl lalos in wi pac topang ke len itkosr . Tukun len itkosr nukewa elos ayaol .
13009026	Mwet topang fulat akosr elos mwet Levi , ac ma kunalos in liyaung ma nukewa . Elos karingin pac fukil ma oan in Tempul , oayapa kufwen orekma nukewa ma oan in fukil inge .
13009027	Elos muta fototo nu ke Tempul mweyen ma kunalos in karinganang , ac ikasla mutunpot ke lotutang nukewa .
13009028	Oasr mwet Levi saya , ac elos pa karinganang kufwen ma orekmakinyuk ke pacl in alu uh . Elos pa oek ma itukla , na sifilpa oek ma folokinyukme ke pacl nukewa orekmakinyuk uh .
13009029	Ac kutu selos pa karingin kufwen orekma mutal , oayapa flao , wain , oil in olive , mwe keng , ac mwe akyu mwe mongo .
13009030	Tusruktu ma kunen mwet tol in arukak mwe akyu an .
13009031	Sie mwet Levi su inel pa Mattithiah , wen se meet natul Shallum ke sou lulap lal Korah , el pa karingin akoeyen mwe kisa manman .
13009032	Ma kunen mwet in sou lal Kohath in akoo bread mutal ma orekmakinyuk in Tempul ke len Sabbath nukewa .
13009033	Kutu sou in sruf lal Levi pa karingin on in Tempul . Sifen sou in on inge elos muta in kutu lohm inkul lun Tempul uh , ac elos tia oru kutena orekma saya mweyen elos akola nu ke pang nu selos len ac fong .
13009034	Mwet ma takinyukla inelos lucng pa sifen kais sie sou lun mwet Levi , fal nu ke fwil lun mwet matu lalos an . Elos mwet kol su muta Jerusalem .
13009035	Jeiel pa musaeak siti Gibeon ac oakwuki we . Inen mutan kial uh pa Maacah .
13009036	Wen se meet natul pa Abdon , na wen saya natul pa Zur , Kish , Baal , Ner , Nadab ,
13009037	Gedor , Ahio , Zechariah , ac Mikloth ,
13009038	su papa tumal Shimeah . Fwilin tulik natulos muta Jerusalem apkuran nu yurin mwet wialos in sou lulap lalos an .
13009039	Ner pa papa tumal Kish , ac Kish pa papa tumal Saul . Oasr wen akosr natul Saul : elos pa Jonathan , Malchishua , Abinadab , ac Ishbosheth .
13009040	Jonathan pa papa tumal Mephibosheth , su papa tumal Micah .
13009041	Oasr wen akosr natul Micah : elos pa Pithon , Melech , Tarea , ac Ahaz .
13009042	Ahaz pa papa tumal Jarah . Oasr wen tolu natul Jarah : elos pa Alemeth , Azmaveth , ac Zimri . Zimri pa papa tumal Moza ,
13009043	su papa tumal Binea , su papa tumal Rephaiah , su papa tumal Eleasah , su papa tumal Azel .
13009044	Oasr wen onkosr natul Azel : elos pa Azrikam , Bocheru , Ishmael , Sheariah , Obadiah , ac Hanan .
13010001	Mwet Philistia elos mweun lain mwet Israel Fineol Gilboa . Pus mwet Israel misa we . Mwet lula selos , oayapa Tokosra Saul ac wen natul uh , elos kaingla .
13010002	Tusruktu , mwet Philistia elos ukwalos ac uniya wen tolu natul Saul : Jonathan , Abinadab , ac Malchishua .
13010003	Mweun sac arulana upa ke acn Saul el muta we , na pisrkiyuki el ke pisr nutin mwet lokoalok lal ac yohk kinet kacl .
13010004	Saul el fahk nu sin mwet fusr se su us mwe mweun natul ah , “ Faesak cutlass nutum an ac uniyuwi , tuh mwet Philistia pegan ingan in tia konkin keik . ” Tuh mwet fusr sac el arulana sangeng ac kofla orala . Ke ma inge Saul el srukak cutlass natul sifacna ac putatyang nu fac .
13010005	Ke mwet fusr sac liye lah Saul el misa , na el sifacna putatyang nu fin cutlass natul ah , ac misa pac .
13010006	Ke ma inge Saul ac wen tolu natul tukenina misa , ac wangin sin fwil natul leum fin acn Israel .
13010007	Ke mwet Israel su muta Infahlfal Jezreel lohng lah un mwet mweun lalos kaing , ac Saul ac wen natul elos misa , elos sisla acn selos ac kaingla . Na mwet Philistia elos tuku ac muta we .
13010008	In len se tukun mweun sac , mwet Philistia elos som in suk ma wap ke mwet misa , na elos koneak manol Saul ac wen natul ah oan Fineol Gilboa .
13010009	Elos pakela sifal Saul , ac sarukla mwe loeyuk lal , na elos supwalik ma inge yurin mwet utuk kas nu in facl Philistia nufon in fahkak pweng wo se inge nu ke ma sruloala lalos ac nu sin mwet lalos .
13010010	Elos filiya mwe mweun natul Saul in sie sin tempul lalos , ac srupusrak sifal Saul in tempul lal Dagon , god lalos .
13010011	Ke mwet Jabesh in Gilead elos lohng ma mwet Philistia oru nu sel Saul ,
13010012	na mwet pulaik lalos som ac eisya manol Saul ac wen natul , ac usla nu Jabesh . Elos pikinya manoltal ye sak oak soko , ac elos lalo ke len itkosr .
13010013	Saul el misa mweyen el tia inse pwaye nu sin LEUM GOD . El seakos ma sap lun LEUM GOD , ac el suk kasreyuk lal yurin ngunin mwet misa .
13010014	El tuh tia eis kasru lal sin LEUM GOD . Ouinge LEUM GOD El lela tuh elan misa , ac El sang tokosrai sac nu inpaol David , wen natul Jesse .
13011001	Mwet Israel nukewa elos som nu yorol David in acn Flebron ac fahk nu sel , “ Kut mwet srahm na pwaye ac kut ikwa sefanna .
13011002	In pacl somla , finne Saul pa tokosra lasr ah , kom pa kol mwet Israel ke mweun , ac LEUM GOD lom el wuleot nu sum lah kom ac fah leum fin mwet Israel ac karingin kut oana sie mwet shepherd . ”
13011003	Ouinge mwet kol nukewa lun Israel elos tuku nu yorol David in acn Hebron . David el orala sie wulela na ku yorolos , ac elos mosrwella tuh elan tokosra lun Israel , oana ma LEUM GOD El tuh wulela kac in kas lal Samuel .
13011004	Tokosra David ac mwet Israel nukewa elos utyak nu Jerusalem ac mweuni siti sac . In pacl se ingo inen siti sac pa Jebus , ac mwet na pwaye lun an we — mwet Jebus — elos srakna muta we .
13011005	Mwet Jebus elos tuh fahk nu sel David mu el ac tiana ku in utyak nu in siti sac . Tusruktu David el sruokya pot ku lalos Zion , na mutawauk in pangpang acn sac “ Siti sel David . ”
13011006	David el fahk , “ Mwet se emeet su uniya sie mwet Jebus , el ac fah captain lun un mwet mweun ! ” Na Joab , su nina kial pa Zeruiah , el pa fahsryak emeet in mweun , ouinge el pa captain lun un mwet mweun lal David .
13011007	Ke sripen David el som muta ke pot sac , acn sac tufah pangpang “ Siti sel David . ”
13011008	David el sifil musaela siti sac , mutawauk ke acn se ma koaneyukla layen kutulap in eol soko we . Ac Joab el aksasuye acn lula ke siti sac .
13011009	David el kapkapak ac kui , mweyen LEUM GOD Kulana El welul .
13011010	Inen mwet mweun pwengpeng lal David pa takinyukla inge . U se inge , weang mwet Israel nukewa saya , elos kasrel David tuh elan tokosrala in oana ma LEUM GOD El tuh wulela , ac elos oru tuh tokosrai lal in ku na .
13011011	Mwet se meet an pa Jashobeam , ke sou lulap lal Hachmon . El mwet kol lun u se pangpang “ Mwet Tolu ” ah . El anwukkin osra natul lain mwet tolfoko , ac uniya nufon ke mweun sefanna .
13011012	Mwet se akluo sin mwet pwengpeng tolu inge pa Eleazar , wen natul Dodo in sou lal Ahoh .
13011013	El welul David mweun lain mwet Philistia ke mweun se in Pas Dammim . El tuh muta in ima in barley se ke mwet Israel elos mutawauk in kaing .
13011014	Eleazar ac mwet lal elos tiana kaing , a elos tu na infulwen ima sac ac mweun lain mwet Philistia . LEUM GOD El sang kutangla na yohk se nu sel .
13011015	Sie len ah , tolu sin mwet mweun pwengpeng tolngoul som nu ke acn se David el muta we sisken sie eot ma apkuran nu ke Luf Adullam . In pacl sac pacna oasr un mwet Philistia mutangan aktuktuk ke Infahlfal Rephaim .
13011016	Ke pacl se ingan , David el muta ke sie tohktok ma kuhlusyukyak , ac sie pac un mwet Philistia elos sruokya acn Bethlehem ac muta we .
13011017	David el srounfusryak ac fahk , “ Nga ke sie mwet in use kutu kof ah nimuk ke lufin kof se ke mutunpot Bethlehem ! ”
13011018	Mwet mweun pwengpeng tolu ah elos fokoko na sifacna utyak sasla nien aktuktuk lun mwet Philistia , na utia kof ke lufin kof sac ac usla nu yorol David . Tusruktu el tiana nimya , a el okoala nu infohk uh tuh in mwe kisa nu sin LEUM GOD .
13011019	El fahk , “ Nga koflana nim kof se inge , mweyen ac oana ngan nim srahn mwet su pilesrala moul lalos inge ! ” Ouinge el srangesr nim . Na pa ingan orekma pulaik lun mwet mweun pwengpeng tolu ah .
13011020	Abishai , tamulel lal Joab , el pa mwet kol lun u se pangpang “ Mwet Pwengpeng Tolngoul . ” El anwukkin osra natul in lain mwet tolfoko , ac el onelosi nufon . Na el mutawauk in pwengpeng inmasrlon “ Mwet Tolngoul ” ah .
13011021	El pa pwengpeng emeet sin “ Mwet Tolngoul ” ah , ac el mwet kol lac lalos , tusruktu el tia arulana pwengpeng oana “ Mwet Tolu ” ah .
13011022	Benaiah , wen natul Jehoiada mwet Kabzeel , el sie mwet mweun pwengpeng , ac el oru ma watwen pus . Sie pacl ah el uniya mwet mweun na ku luo lun mwet Moab . Oayapa sie len ma yohk snow ah , el tufoki nu in luf se ac uniya lion soko .
13011023	El oayapa uniya mukul Egypt se — sie mwet yohk pisa ac fit itkosr tafu fulatal , ac el sruokya osra na lulap soko . Benaiah el lainul ke sikal soko . El tulakunla osra soko liki poun mwet Egypt sac , ac sang unilya .
13011024	Pa ingan kutu ma watwen Benaiah el oru , su sie sin “ Mwet Tolngoul ” ah .
13011025	El pisrla inmasrlon “ Mwet Tolngoul ” ah , tusruktu el tia pwengpeng oana “ Mwet Tolu ” ah . Na David el sang tuh Benaiah elan mwet kol fin mwet mweun karinginyal sifacna .
13011026	Pa inge inen mwet saya su pisrla ke mweun uh : Asahel , tamulel lal Joab Elhanan wen natul Dodo , mwet Bethlehem
13011027	Shammoth mwet Harod Helez mwet Pelet
13011028	Ira wen natul Ikkesh , mwet Tekoa Abiezer mwet Anathoth
13011029	Sibbecai mwet Hushah Ilai mwet Ahoh
13011030	Maharai mwet Netophah Heled wen natul Baanah , mwet Netophah
13011031	Ithai wen natul Ribai , mwet Gibeah in sruf lal Benjamin Benaiah mwet Pirathon
13011032	Hurai , su muta infahlfal apkuran nu Gaash Abiel mwet Arbah
13011033	Azmaveth mwet Bahurum Eliahba mwet Shaalbon
13011034	Hashem mwet Gizon Jonathan wen natul Shagee , mwet Harar
13011035	Ahiam wen natul Sachar , mwet Harar Eliphal wen natul Ur
13011036	Hepher mwet Mecherah Ahijah mwet Pelon
13011037	Hezro mwet Carmel Naarai wen natul Ezbai
13011038	Joel tamulel lal Nathan Mibhar wen natul Hagri
13011039	Zelek mwet Ammon Naharai mwet Beeroth , su utuk mwe mweun lal Joab wen natul Zeruiah
13011040	Ira ac Gareb , mwet Jattir
13011041	Uriah mwet Hit Zabad wen natul Ahlai
13011042	Adina wen natul Shiza ( sie mwet fulat ke sruf lal Reuben , ac oasr mwet mweun tolngoul welul )
13011043	Hanan wen natul Maacah Joshaphat mwet Mithan
13011044	Uzzia mwet Ashterah Shamma ac Jeiel , wen natul Hotham mwet Aroer
13011045	Jediael ac Joha , wen natul Shimri mwet Tiz
13011046	Eliel mwet Mahavah Jeribai ac Joshaviah , wen natul Elnaam Ithmah mwet Moab
13011047	Eliel , Obed , ac Jaasiel , mwet Zobah
13012001	David el muta Ziklag , acn el tuh som nu we ke el kakaingkunul Tokosra Saul . Pus mwet mweun fas ac oaru elos tuh welulang in pacl sac .
13012002	Mwet ingan ma ke sruf lal Benjamin , sruf pac lal Saul . Elos fin pisr , ku orekmakin fuht natulos , elos ku in orekmakin paolos kewa , layot ac lasa .
13012003	Captain lun u se inge pa Ahiezer ac Joash , wen luo natul Shemaah , mwet Gibeah . Inen mwet mweun wialos pa inge : Jeziel ac Pelet , wen luo natul Azmaveth Beracah ac Jehu , mwet Anathoth
13012004	Ishmaiah mwet Gibeon , sie mwet mweun pwengpeng su sie sin mwet kol lun “ Mwet Tolngoul ” Jeremiah , Jahaziel , Johannan , ac Jozabad , mwet Gederah
13012005	
13012006	Eluzai , Jerimoth , Bealiah , Shemariah , ac Shephatiah , mwet Hariph
13012007	Elkanah , Isshiah , Azarel , Joezer , ac Jashobeam , mwet Korah
13012008	Joelah ac Zebadiah , wen natul Jeroham mwet Gedor
13012009	Pa inge inen mwet mweun pwengpeng ac fas in sruf lal Gad su weang un mwet lal David ke el tuh muta ke pot se yen mwesis ah . Elos arulana etu orekmakin mwe loeyuk ac osra . Ngetnget lalos sulallal oana mutun lion , ac elos irpit oana deer fineol uh .
13012010	Pa inge takin wal lalos : Ezer pa emeet , Obadiah akluo , Eliab aktolu ,
13012011	Mishmannah akakosr , Jeremiah aklimekosr ,
13012012	Attai akonkosr , Eliel akitkosr ,
13012013	Johanan akoalkosr , Elzabad akeu ,
13012014	Jeremiah aksingoul , ac Machbannai aksingoul sie .
13012015	Kutu sin mwet in sruf lal Gad inge elos captain fulat fin tausin , ac kutu elos mwet kol fin foko .
13012016	Ke malem se meet in yac se ma Infacl Jordan tuh sronot lulap , mwet inge elos fahsr sasla infacl ah , ac ukweak mwet nukewa su muta ke infahlfal nu kutulap , oayapa infahlfal nu roto .
13012017	Sie pacl ah sie u sin mwet Benjamin ac mwet Judah elos fahla nu ke pot se David el muta we .
13012018	David el som in sonolos ac el fahk nu selos , “ Kowos fin tuku ke misla tuh kowos in kasreyu , nga engan in paing kowos . Fahsru , wikutyang ! A kowos fin nunku in tukakinyuyak nu sin mwet lokoalok luk , sruhk wangin ma nga oru koluk nu suwos , God lun papa tumasr El etu , ac El ac fah sot kaiyuk nu suwos . ”
13012019	Na ngun lun God tuku ke ku nu fin sie selos , Amasai , su tok el pa captain lun “ Mwet Tolngoul ” ah , ac el fahk ke pusra lulap , “ David , wen natul Jesse , kut mwet lom ! Insewowo nu sum ac nu selos nukewa su kasrekom ! God El wi kom lac . ” David el paingulos ac eisalos tuh elos in captain lun un mwet mweun lal .
13012020	Kutu mwet mweun in sruf lal Manasseh elos tuh welulang David ke pacl se el wi mwet Philistia som in mweunel Tokosra Saul . Tusruktu David el tuh tiana kasru mwet Philistia in pacl sac , ke sripen tokosra lalos elos sensen mu David el ac tuh forla welul Saul lainulos , oru elos folokunulla David nu Ziklag .
13012021	Pa inge inen mwet mweun lun Manasseh su welulang David ke pacl el folok ah : Adnah , Jozabad , Jediael , Michael , Jozabad , Elihu , ac Zillethai . Kais sie mwet inge elos tuh captain fin mwet mweun sie tausin in acn Manasseh .
13012022	Elos kulansupwal David ac kol mwet mweun lal , mweyen elos nukewa mwet na fas ke mweun . Tok , elos captain lun un mwet mweun lun Israel nufon .
13012023	Apkuran in len nukewa oasr mwet sasu welulang David , pwanang un mwet mweun lal ah sa na in kui ac arulana yohk .
13012024	Ke David el tuh muta Hebron , mwet mweun puspis elos tuku weang un mwet mweun lal in kasrel tuh elan aolulla Saul ac tokosra , oana ma LEUM GOD El tuh wulela kac .
13012025	Pisen mwet Judah ma utuk mwe loang ac osra pa mwet onkosr tausin oalfoko .
13012026	Pisen mwet Simeon su akola nu ke mweun pa mwet itkosr tausin siofok .
13012027	Pisen mwet Levi pa mwet akosr tausin onfoko :
13012028	mwet lal Jehoiada in fwil lal Aaron , oasr mwet tolu tausin itfoko ,
13012029	mwet in sou lal Zadok , su sie mwet fusr pulaik , oasr mwet kol longoul luo .
13012030	Pisen mwet Benjamin ( sruf lal Saul sifacna ) pa mwet tolu tausin — pusiyen mwet Benjamin elos tuh welul na Saul .
13012031	Pisen mwet Ephraim pa mwet longoul tausin oalfoko su pwengpeng in sou lalos sifacna .
13012032	Pisen mwet in Tafun Manasseh Roto pa mwet singoul oalkosr tausin su sulosolla in som ac akleumyal David .
13012033	Pisen mwet Issachar pa mwet kol luofoko , weang pac mwet lalos uh . ( Mwet inge kewa etu ma fal mwet Israel in oru , oayapa ke pacl fal in mukuikui kac ) .
13012034	Pisen mwet Zebulun pa mwet lumngaul tausin su alken ke orekma ac arulana pwaye insialos , oayapa elos etu orekmakinyen mwe mweun nukewa .
13012035	Pisen mwet Naphtali pa sie tausin mwet kol , weang pac mwet tolngoul itkosr tausin su utuk mwe loeyuk ac osra .
13012036	Pisen mwet Dan pa mwet longoul oalkosr tausin onfoko su akpah tari nu ke mweun .
13012037	Pisen mwet Asher pa mwet angngaul tausin su akola nu ke mweun .
13012038	Pisen mwet Reuben ac Gad ac Tafun Manasseh Kutulap , ( sruf inge kewa muta kutulap in Infacl Jordan ) oasr mwet siofok longoul tausin , ac elos nukewa pahla ke utuk kain in mwe mweun nukewa .
13012039	Mwet mweun inge nukewa elos akola nu ke mweun ke elos som nu Hebron ke sripa sifanna : in akleumyal David tuh elan tokosra fin Israel nufon . Ac mwet Israel nukewa wialos insese pac nu kac .
13012040	Mwet mweun inge elos muta yorol David ke lusen len tolu , ac elos mongo ac nim ma mwet Israel wialos tuh akoo nu selos .
13012041	Finne mwet su muta loesla nu epang — oana mwet in sruf lun Issachar , Zebulun , ac Naphtali — elos utuk mwe mongo fin donkey , camel , miul , ac cow natulos . Pukanten flao , fig , tun in raisin , wain , ac oil in olive . Elos usla pac cow ac sheep , elos in uniya mwe mongo pac . Ma inge nukewa mwe akkalemye lupan engan lun mwet Israel yen nukewa .
13013001	Tokosra David el pwapa yurin captain lun un mwet mweun lal — elos su kol fin tausin ac elos su kol fin foko .
13013002	Na el fahkak nu sin mwet Israel nukewa , “ Fin wo suwos , ac fin ou lungse lun LEUM GOD lasr , lela kut in sulkakinelik nu sin mwet nukewa wiasr , ac nu sin mwet tol ac mwet Levi in acn elos muta we , tuh elos in toeni yorosr in acn se inge .
13013003	Na kut fah som ac folokonma Tuptup in Wuleang lun God lasr , ma kut tuh pilesrala ke pacl Saul el tokosra ah .
13013004	Mwet uh elos insewowo ac insese nu ke nunak se inge .
13013005	Ouinge David el eisani mwet nukewa in Israel , mutawauk in acn eir ke masrol nu Egypt , fahla nwe ke sun Innek In Utyak Nu Hamath nu epang , tuh elos in use Tuptup in Wuleang liki acn Kiriath Jearim nu Jerusalem .
13013006	Na David ac mwet uh som nu ke siti Baalah ( su pangpang pac Kiriath Jearim ) in facl Judah , tuh elos in eisla Tuptup in Wuleang lun God , su Inen LEUM GOD simla oan kac , ac tron lal oan fin posohksok lun cherub lukwa ah .
13013007	Elos eisla Tuptup in Wuleang liki lohm sel Abinadab ac filiya fin soko mwe wiwa sasu . Uzzah ac Ahio pa us mwe wiwa soko uh .
13013008	Ke pacl se inge David ac mwet nukewa elos onsrosro ke kuiyalos nufon in akfulatye God . Elos on ac srital ke mwe on inge : harp , drum , cymbal , ac trumpet .
13013009	Ke elos tuku sun nien kulkul wheat in acn Chidon , cow ma ul mwe wiwa uh tukulkulyak , ac Uzzah el saplakla ac sruokya Tuptup in Wuleang .
13013010	In kitin pacl ah , LEUM GOD El mulat sel Uzzah , ac unilya ke sripen el kahlye Tuptup sac . El misa insacn ye mutun God .
13013011	Ke ma inge acn sac pangpang Perez Uzzah in pacl sac me . David el arulana toasr lah LEUM GOD El sang kaiyuk nu sel Uzzah ke kasrkusrak .
13013012	Ke ma inge David el sangeng sin God ac fahk , “ Inge nga ac usla fuka Tuptup in Wuleang tuh in wiyu ? ”
13013013	Ke ma inge David el tia us Tuptup sac in welul nu Jerusalem , a el filiya in lohm sin sie mwet pangpang Obed Edom , in siti Gath .
13013014	Tuptup sac oanna we ke malem tolu , ac LEUM GOD El akinsewowoye sou lal Obed Edom ac ma lal nukewa .
13014001	Tokosra Hiram lun acn Tyre el supwala un mwet orekma nu yorol David . El sang sak cedar wi mwet musa ac mwet tufahl eot , in musai sie lohm sin tokosra .
13014002	Ouinge David el akilen lah LEUM GOD El oakilya elan tokosra lun Israel , ac oru tuh tokosrai lal in kapkapak ke sripen Israel mwet lal .
13014003	In acn Jerusalem , David el sifil payuk nu sin mutan pus , na puseni wen natul ac acn natul .
13014004	Tulik inge isusla nu sel in Jerusalem : Shammua , Shobab , Nathan , Solomon ,
13014005	Ibhar , Elishua , Elpelet ,
13014006	Nogah , Nepheg , Japhia ,
13014007	Elishama , Beeliada , ac Eliphelet .
13014008	Ke mwet Philistia elos lohng lah David el tokosra fin facl Israel nufon , na un mwet mweun lalos som in sruokilya . Na David ac mwet lal elos fahsr nu yorolos in osun nu selos .
13014009	Mwet Philistia elos sun Infahlfal Rephaim ac mutawauk in pisrala ma nukewa we .
13014010	Ac David el siyuk sin God , “ Ya nga in mweuni mwet Philistia ? Ya kom ac fah ase kutangla nu sik ? ” LEUM GOD El topuk ac fahk , “ Aok , fahla mweun ! Nga ac fah asot kutangla nu sum ! ”
13014011	Ke ma inge David el tuyak mweun lainulos in acn Baal Perazim ac kutangulosla . Ac el fahk , “ God El orekmakinyu in kunauselik mwet lokoalok luk , oana sronot se . ” Ouinge acn sac pangpang Baal Perazim .
13014012	Ke mwet Philistia elos kaing , elos sisla ma sruloala lalos ac som , na David el sap in isisyak ma inge .
13014013	Tia paht toko , mwet Philistia elos sifil folok nu infahlfal sac ac mutawauk in sifil pisrapasr .
13014014	David el sifilpa siyuk kasru Sjn God , ac God El topuk ac fahk , “ Nimet ut insacn ke kom ac mweunelos . Fahla nu layen laco ac akoia in mweunelos apkuran nu ke insak balsam uh .
13014015	Ke pacl se kom lohng pusren un mwet fahsr insroan sak uh , na kom tuyak mweun , mweyen nga ac fahsr meet liki kowos in kutangla un mwet mweun Philistia . ”
13014016	David el oru oana ma LEUM GOD El sapkin , pwanang el tuh ukweak mwet Philistia liki acn Gibeon nwe ke sun acn Gezer . I
13014017	Pweng kacl David fahsrelik nu yen nukewa , ac LEUM GOD El oru tuh mutunfacl nukewa in sangeng sel David .
13015001	David el musaela kutu lohm in Siti sel David tuh inlohm sel sifacna . El oayapa akoo sie acn nu ke Tuptup in Wuleang lun God , ac el tulokunak sie lohm nuknuk nu kac .
13015002	Na David el fahk , “ Mwet Levi mukena pa fal in us Tuptup in Wuleang , mweyen elos pa sulosolla sin LEUM GOD tuh elos in us , ac in kulansap nu sel nwe tok . ”
13015003	Ouinge David el pangoneni mwet Israel nukewa nu Jerusalem , tuh elos in use Tuptup in Wuleang nu ke acn se el akoela nu kac .
13015004	Tukun ma inge David el sapla nu sin mwet in fwil natul Aaron ac mwet Levi .
13015005	Ke sou lulap lal Kohath in sruf lun mwet Levi , Uriel el mwet kol , ac mwet siofok longoul in sou lal welul .
13015006	Sin scu lal Merari , Asaiah el mwet kol , ac mwet luofoko longoul in sou lal welul .
13015007	Sin sou lal Gershon , Joel el mwet kol , ac mwet siofok tolngoul in sou lal welul .
13015008	Sin sou lal Elizaphan , Shemaiah el mwet kol , a ; mwet luofoko in sou lal welul .
13015009	Sin sou lal Hebron , Eliel el mwet kol , ac mwet oalngoul in sou lal welul .
13015010	Sin sou lal Uzziel , Amminadab el mwet kol , ac mwet siofok singoul luo in sou lal welul .
13015011	David el solani mwet tol Zadok ac Abiathar , ac mwet Levi onkosr inge : Uriel , Asaiah , Joel , Shemaiah , Eliel , ac Amminadab .
13015012	El fahk nu sin mwet Levi , “ Kowos pa mwet kol lun sou lulap lun mwet Levi . Kowos in aknasnasye kowos oayapa mwet Levi wiowos , tuh kowos in ku in use Tuptup in Wuleang lun LEUM GOD lun Israel nu in acn se nga akoela nu kac .
13015013	Ke sripsn kowos wangin ke pacl se meet ma kut tuh srike in use , na pa LELM GOD lasr El tuh kai kut mweyen kit tuh tia oru akfulat su fal in orek ru sel . ”
13015014	Na mwet ol ac mwet Levi elos aknasnasyalostuh elos in mau ku in moklema Tup : up in Wuleang lun LEUM GOD lun Israel .
13015015	Mwet Levi elos us Tuptup uh linpisalos ke srenenu , in oana ke LEUM GOD El tuh sapkin nu sel Moses .
13015016	David el sap mwet kol lun mwet Levi in sulela kutu mwet lalos in on , ac kuti in srital ke harp ac cymbal , in fahkak pusren engan lulap .
13015017	Ouinge mwet Levi elos sulela mwet inge liki sou lun mwet on : Heman wen natul Joel , oayapa sie mukul in sou lal , su Asaph wen natul Berechiah ; ac Ethan wen natul Kushaiah , su ma wialos ke sou lal Merari ;
13015018	na mukul wialtal in fwil se akluo : Zechariah , Jaaziel , Shemiramoth , Jehiel , Unni , Eliab , Benaiah , Maaseiah , Mattithiah , Eliphelehu , Mikneiah , ac mwet luo su liyaung mutunpot : Obed Edom ac Jeiel .
13015019	Mwet in srital ke cymbal orek ke bronze pa Heman , Asaph , ac Ethan .
13015020	Mwet in srital ke harp ma fulat pusra uh pa Zechariah , Jaaziel , Shemiramoth , Jehiel , Unni , Eliab , Maaseiah ac Benaiah .
13015021	Mwet inge pa srital ke harp ma toasr pusra uh : Mattithiah , Eliphelehu , Mikneiah , Obed Edom , Jeiel , ac Azaziah .
13015022	Elos sulella Chenaniah in kol mwet on inge nukewa lun mwet Levi , mweyen yohk etu lal ke on .
13015023	Mwet in taran Tuptup in Wuleang pa Berechiah , Elkanah ,
13015024	Obed Edom , ac Jehiah . Mwet in fahsr meet liki Tuptup uh ac ukya mwe ukuk pa mwet tol inge : Shebaniah , Joshaphat , Nethanel , Amasai , Zechariah , Benaiah , ac Eliezer .
13015025	Tokosra David , ac mwet kol lun mwet Israel , ac captain lun un mwet mweun , elos tukeni som in use Tuptup in Wuleang lun LEUM GOD liki lohm sel Obed Edom , ac elos engan ma lulap .
13015026	Elos kisakin cow mukul itkosr ac sheep mukul itkosr mwe akpwayeye lah God El ac fah kasru mwet Levi su us Tuptup in Wuleang .
13015027	David el nukum sie nuknuk Ioeloes orek ke linen wowo . Mwet on nukewa , ac Chenaniah su mwet kol lalos , oayapa mwet Levi su us Tuptup uh , elos nukewa nukum nuknuk linen oana David . David el oayapa nukum sie ephod lun mwet tol orekla ke linen .
13015028	Na mwet Israel nukewa elos welulos fahsr ac usak Tuptup in Wuleang nu Jerusalem ke pusren engan ac sasa , oayapa pusren mwe ukuk , trumpet , cymbal , ac harp .
13015029	Ke Tuptup sac utyak nu in siti uh , na Michal , acn natul Saul , el ngetla liki winto uh ac liyal Tokosra David ke el tacn ac onsrosro ke engan lulap , na Michal el arulana toasr sel kac .
13016001	Elos usla Tuptup in Wuleang nu in lohm nuknuk se David el akoela nu kac , ac elos filiya loac . Na elos orek kisa ac mwe kisa in akinsewowo nu sin God .
13016002	Tukun David el orek kisa tari , el akinsewowoye mwet uh Inen LEUM GOD ,
13016003	ac el kitalik mwe mongo nu selos nukewa . El sang nu sin kais sie mukul ac mutan in Israel kais soko lof in bread , ipin ikwa manman se , ac kutu raisin .
13016004	David el sulela kutu mwet in sruf lal Levi tuh elos in kol alu lalos nu sin LEUM GOD lun Israel , ac elos on ac kaksakunul ye mutun Tuptup in Wuleang .
13016005	Asaph pa sulosolla tuh elan mwet kol , ac Zechariah el mwet kasru lal . Jeiel , Shemiramoth , Jehiel , Mattithiah , Eliab , Benaiah , Obed Edom , ac Jeiel pa ac srital ke harp . Asaph pa srital ke cymbal ,
13016006	ac ma kunen mwet tol luo , Benaiah ac Jahaziel , in uk mwe ukuk ye mutun Tuptup in Wuleang ke len nukewa .
13016007	Pa inge pacl se emeet David el sang kunokon se inge nu sel Asaph ac mwet Levi wial , tuh in elos pa on ac kaksakin LEUM GOD .
13016008	Sang kulo nu sin LEUM GOD , ac fahkak fulat lal ; Fahkak orekma lal nu sin mutanfahl uh .
13016009	On ac kaksakin LEUM GOD ; Fahkak orekma wolana ma El orala .
13016010	Kut in engan lah kut ma lal ; Lela mwet nukewa su alu nu sel in arulana engan !
13016011	Ngetak nu sin LEUM GOD tuh Elan kasrekowos , Alu nu sel pacl e nukewa .
13016012	Esam orekma sakirik El orala , Mwenmen lal ac nununku lal su El fahkla .
13016013	Kowos fwil natul Jacob , mwet kulansap lal , Tulik nutin Israel , su God El sulela .
13016014	LEUM GOD El God lasr ; Ma sap lal ma nu sin faclu nufon .
13016015	Nikmet mulkunla wuleang lun God , Su El orala tuh in oan ma pahtpat ,
13016016	Wuleang su El oakiya inmasrlol ac Abraham , Aok , wulela lal nu sel Isaac .
13016017	LEUM GOD El orala sie wulela yorol Jacob , Sie wulela su fah oan ma pahtpat .
13016018	El fahk , “ Nga ac fah asot facl Canaan nu sum . Ac fah mwe usru lom sifacna . ”
13016019	Mwet lun God elos mwet pu , Elos tuh mwetsac in facl Canaan .
13016020	Elos forfor liki sie mutunfacl nu ke sie pac mutunfacl , Liki sie tokosrai nu ke sie pacna tokosrai .
13016021	Tuh God El tia lela kutena mwet in akkeokyalos ; El karingnalos ke El kai tokosra saya ac fahk ,
13016022	“ Nik kowos aklokoalokye mwet kulansap sulosolla luk ; Nik kowos kalyei mwet palu luk .
13016023	On nu sin LEUM GOD , kwos mwet faclu nufon ! Fahkak pweng wo ke len nukewa lah El molikutla .
13016024	Fahkak wolana lal nu sin mutanfahl uh , Fahkak orekma ku lal nu sin mwet nukewa .
13016025	LEUM GOD El fulat , ac fal in arulana kaksakinyuk El ; Lela in akfulatyeyuk El yohk liki god nukewa .
13016026	Tuh god lun mutunfacl saya kewa elos ma sruloala na , A LEUM GOD El orala kusrao .
13016027	Wolana ac sunak apnulla , Ku ac insewowo nwakla Tempul lal .
13016028	Mwet nukewa fin faclu , kowos in kaksakin LEUM GOD , Kaksakin wolana lal ac ku lal .
13016029	Kaksakin Ine wolana lun LEUM GOD ; Fahsru nu in Tempul lal ac use mwe sang lowos nu sel . Epasr ye mutun El su Mutal ke El sikyak ;
13016030	Rarrar ye mutal , kowos faclu nufon ! Faclu oakwuki ku , ac tia ku in mokleyuk .
13016031	Kusrao ac faclu , kowos in enganak ! Fahkak nu sin mutanfahl uh lah LEUM GOD El tokosra .
13016032	Meoa ac ma nukewa loac in ngirngir ; Lela inima uh ac ma nukewa we in enganak !
13016033	Sak insak uh elos fah sasa ke engan Ke LEUM GOD El ac tuku in leumi faclu .
13016034	Sang kulo nu sin LEUM GOD , mweyen El wo ; Lungse lal oan ma pahtpat .
13016035	Kowos in fahk nu sel , “ O God , Mwet Lango lasr , molikutla ; Uskuteni nu sie , ac molikutla liki mutunfacl saya , Tuh kut fah ku in sang kulo Ac kaksakin Ine mutal lom . ”
13016036	Kaksakin LEUM GOD , God lun Israel ! Kaksakunul inge ac nu tok ma pahtpat ! Na mwet nukewa elos fahk , “ Amen , ” ac elos kaksakin LEUM GOD .
13016037	Tokosra David el sang tuh in ma kunal Asaph ac mwet Levi wial ah tuh elos in liyaung alu in acn se ma Tuptup in Wuleang oan we . Na elos in oru orekma lalos we ke len nukewa nwe tok .
13016038	Obed Edom wen natul Jeduthun , ac mwet onngoul oalkosr in sou lal pa mwet kasru lalos . Ma kunen Hosah ac Obed Edom in topang ke mutunpot .
13016039	Tusruktu ma kunen mwet tol Zadok ac mwet tol wial , in karingin alu nu sin LEUM GOD ke nien alu in acn Gibeon .
13016040	Ke lotutang ac eku nukewa , elos oru mwe kisa firir fin loang uh , fal nu ke ma simusla in Ma Sap su LEUM GOD El tuh sang nu sin Israel .
13016041	Sayen mwet tol inge , Heman ac Jeduthun oelulos , ac oayapa kutu pac mwet su sulosolla tuh elos in on in kaksakin LEUM GOD ke sripen lungse lal su oan ma pahtpat .
13016042	Ma kunen Heman ac Jeduthun in karinganang trumpet ac cymbal ac oayapa mwe on saya ma orekmakinyuk ke pacl on in kaksak inge orek uh . Ma kunen mwet in sou lal Jeduthun in topang ke mutunpot uh .
13016043	Na mwet nukewa folokla nu acn selos , ac David el folokla pac nu acn sel nu yurin sou lal .
13017001	Inge Tokosra David el muta okak in lohm sin tokosra . Sie len ah el sapla nu sel Nathan mwet palu , ac fahk , “ Inge nga muta in sie lohm orekla ke sak cedar , a Tuptup in Wuleang lun LEUM GOD oan in lohm nuknuk se ! ”
13017002	Ac Nathan el fahk , “ Oru ma nukewa ma kom nunku an , mweyen God El wi kom . ”
13017003	Tusruk in fong sac , God El fahk nu sel Nathan ,
13017004	“ Fahla ac fahk nu sel David mwet kulansap luk , lah nga fahk , ‘ Tia kom pa mwet se ac musai sie tempul nu sik ngan muta loac .
13017005	Oe ke pacl se nga tuh molela mwet Israel liki inpoun mwet Egyptah nwe misenge nga soenna muta in sie tempul . Pacl nukewa nga muta in lohm nuknuk ac mukuiwot mukuime , acn nu ke acn .
13017006	In fufahsryesr luk nukewa yurin mwet Israel , wanginna pacl nga tuh siyuk sin mwet kol su nga sulela ah , lah efu ku elos tia musaela sie tempul ma orek ke sak cedar ah sik . ’
13017007	“ Ke ma inge , fahk nu sel David mwet kulansap luk , lah nga , LEUM GOD Kulana fahk nu sel , ‘ Nga eiskomla liki liyaung sheep inimae , ac oru tuh kom in leum fin mwet luk , mwet Israel .
13017008	Nga tuh wi kom yen nukewa kom fahla nu we , ac nga tuh kutangla mwet lokoalok lom nukewa ye motom . Nga fah oru kom in pwengpeng oana mwet kol fulatlana fin faclu .
13017009	Nga tuh sulela sie acn nu sin mwet luk mwet Israel , ac oakelosi we tuh elos in ku in muta ke acn selos sifacna , ac tia sifil aklokoalokyeyuk . Mwet koluk fah tia sifil akkeokyalos oana meet
13017010	ke pacl lun mwet nununku ah me , su nga tuh pakiya tuh elos in kol mwet luk , mwet Israel . Nga wulela nu sum lah nga ac karingin kom liki mwet lokoalok lom nukewa , oayapa nga fah oru in oasr tulik nutum .
13017011	Ke kom ac misa ac pukpuki yurin mwet matu lom , nga ac oru sie sin wen nutum in tokosra , ac nga ac fah liyaung tokosrai lal in ku .
13017012	El pa mwet se su ac musai sie tempul nu sik , ac nga ac fah oru fita lal in leum ma pahtpat .
13017013	Nga ac fah papa tumal ac el fah wen nutik . Nga ac fah tia tulokinya kasru luk nu sel oana nga tuh oru nu sel Saul , su nga sisella tuh kom in tokosrala .
13017014	Nga ac fah fililya tuh elan kol mwet luk ac tokosrai luk ma pahtpat . Ac fah wangin saflaiyen tokosrai lal nwe tok . ” '
13017015	Nathan el fahkang nu sel David ma nukewa ma God El akkalemye nu sel .
13017016	Na Tokosra David el som nu in Lohm Nuknuk Mutal sin LEUM GOD , ac el muta nu ten ac pre , “ O LEUM GOD , nga ac sou luk kupansuwol in eis ma nukewa ma kom oru tari nu sik .
13017017	Ac inge , LEUM GOD , kom sifilpa oru yohk liki : kom orek wulela tari ke tulik nutik nwe ke yac yac fahsru , ac kom sifacna oru nu sik oana ngan sie mwet fulat .
13017018	Mea pac nga ku in fahk nu sum ! Kom arulana eteyu , a kom akfulatyeyu , mwet kulansap lom .
13017019	Ma inge nukewa orek ke sripen lungse lom ac oakwuk lom , tuh kom in akkalemye nu sik ke ouiyen fulat luk tok .
13017020	LEUM GOD , wangin sie oana kom . Kut nuna etu oemeet me lah kom mukefanna pa God .
13017021	Wangin pac sie mutunfacl fin faclu oana Israel , su kom molelosla liki kohs lalos tuh elos in mwet lom sifacna . Ma usrnguk ac wolana su kom oru nu selos , oru tuh Inem in pwengpeng fin faclu nufon . Kom tuh molela mwet lom liki facl Egypt , ac lusak mutunfacl saya ke mwet lom elos fahsr nu meet .
13017022	Kom oru tuh mwet Israel in mwet lom ma pahtpat , ac kom , LEUM GOD , pa God lalos .
13017023	“ Ac inge , LEUM GOD , oru tuh wuleang se su kom wulela keik ac ke tulik nutik in akpwayeyuk nwe tok , ac oru oana ma kom fahk mu kom ac oru .
13017024	Pweng keim ac fah arulana yohk , ac mwet uh ac fah fahk nwe tok , ‘ LEUM GOD Kulana , El God lun Israel . ’ Ac kom fah karinganang tuh fita luk in leum in fwil nukewa .
13017025	Nga pulaik in pre nu sum ouinge , O God luk , mweyen kom akkalemye ma inge nukewa nu sik , mwet kulansap lom , ac kom fahk pac nu sik lah kom ac oru fwil nutik nukewa in tokosra .
13017026	, Kom , O LEUM GOD , kom pa God , ac kom orala wuleang wolana se inge nu sik .
13017027	Nga siyuk sum tuh kom in akinsewowoye fwil nutik , tuh elos in engankin lungkulang lom pacl e nukewa . O LEUM GOD , kom akinsewowoyalos tari , ac mwe insewowo lom ac fah oan faclos nwe tok . ”
13018001	In kutu pacl tok , Tokosra David el sifilpa mweunimwet Philistia ac kutangulosla . El eisla selos siti Gath wi inkul ma oan raunela .
13018002	El oayapa kutangla mwet Moab , ac elos mutawauk in orekma nu sel ac sang takma nu sel .
13018003	Toko , David el mweun lainul Hadadezer , tokosra lun Zobah in Syria . El mweunul apkuran nu in acn Hamath , mweyen Hadadezer el srike elan eisla acn we , su oan tafunyen lucng ke Infacl Euphrates .
13018004	David el sruokya sie tausin chariot , itkosr tausin mwet kasrusr fin horse , ac longoul tausin sin mwet mweun su fahsrna . El sruokya pisen horse fal nu ke chariot siofok , ac horse nukewa saya el kunausla nialos .
13018005	Ke mwet Syria in acn Damascus elos supwala un mwet mweun in kasrel Tokosra Hadadezer , David el mweunelos ac uniya mwet longoul luo tausin .
13018006	Na David el oakiya nien muta lun mwet mweun lal fin acn Syria ac Damascus , ac mwet in facl inge mutawauk in orekma nu sel David , ac sang takma nu sel . LEUM GOD El oru tuh David elan eis kutangla in acn nukewa .
13018007	David el eisla mwe loang gold liki poun mwet mweun fulat lal Hadadezer , ac el us ma inge nu Jerusalem .
13018008	El oayapa eisla ma puspis ma orekla ke osra bronze liki acn Tibhath ac Kun , su siti lal Hadadezer . ( Tok Solomon el orekmakin bronze inge in orala sie nien kof lulap , oayapa sru ac kufwen mwe orekma lun Tempul . )
13018009	Tokosra Toi lun Hamath el lohng lah David el kutangla mwet mweun nukewa lal Hadadezer .
13018010	Ouinge el supwalla Joram , wen natul , in paingul Tokosra David ac kaksakunul ke kutangla lal facl Hadadezer , su Toi el tuh lain pacl puspis . Joram el us mwe lung nu sel David ma orekla ke gold , silver ac osra bronze .
13018011	David el srela ma inge tuh in orekmakinyuk ke pacl in alu mukena , weang pac gold ac silver ma el tuh sruokya liki mutunfacl el kutangla inge : Edom , Moab , Ammon , Philistia , ac Amalek .
13018012	Abishai , su nina kial pa Zeruiah , el kutangla mwet Edom ke sie mweun in Infahlfal Sohl , ac el uniya mwet singoul oalkosr tausin .
13018013	El oakiya un mwet mweun lal fin acn Edom nufon , ac mwet we elos mutawauk in orekma nu sel Tokosra David . LEUM GOD El oru tuh David elan eis kutangla in acn nukewa .
13018014	David el leum fin acn Israel nufon , ac el arulana karinganang tuh ma orek nu sin mwet lal in fahsr fal ac suwohs pacl nukewa .
13018015	Joab , tamulel lal Abishai , pa captain lun un mwet mweun . Jehoshaphat , wen natul Ahilud , pa karinganang ma Simla .
13018016	Zadok wen natul Ahitub , ac Ahimelech wen natul Abiathar , elos mwet tol . Seraiah el mwet sim inkul lun tokosra .
13018017	Benaiah wen natul Jehoiada , pa kol mwet mweun karinginyal tokosra . Wen natul Tokosra David elos muta ke wal fulat inmasrlon mwet pwapa fulat lal .
13019001	Kutu pacl tok , Tokosra Nahash lun Ammon el misa , ac Hanun wen natul , el tokosrala .
13019002	Tokosra David el fahk , “ Nga enenu in akkalemye nunak in kawuk pwaye luk nu sel Hanun , oana ke Nahash papa tumal , el tuh oru nu sik . ” Ouinge David el supwala mwet utuk kas in fahkak nunak in pakomuta lal ke misa papa tumal ah . Ke elos sun acn Ammon , ac utyak nu yorol Tokosra Hanun ,
13019003	mwet kol lun mwet Ammon elos fahk nu sin tokosra , “ Ku kom nunku mu David el akfulatye papa tomom , pa sis el supwama mwet inge in fahkak kas in pakomuta lal nu sum ? Sutuu na sutuu ! El supwalosme in tuh tuni siti uh , elan mau ku in eisla sesr ! ”
13019004	Hanun el sruokya mwet utuk kas lal David , ac resaela alut lalos , ac wotela nuknuk lalos ah ke finyepalos , ac supwalosla .
13019005	Elos arulana mwekin in folokla nu yen selos . Ke David el lohng ke ma sikyak ah , el sapla nu yorolos tuh elos in mutana Jericho ac tia foloko nwe ke alut lalos ah kapak .
13019006	Tokosra Hanun ac mwet Ammon elos akilen lah elos sifacna oru tuh David elan mwet lokoalok lac lalos . Ke ma inge elos sang apkuran in oalngoul tausin paun in silver nu sin mwet in acn Mesopotamia Lucng , oayapa mwet Maacah ac Zobah in acn Syria , tuh elos in moli chariot ac mwet in utuk chariot .
13019007	Oasr chariot tolngoul luo tausin elos srukak , ac mwet mweun lal Tokosra Maacah elos tuku ac tulokunak nien aktuktuk lalos apkuran nu Medeba . Mwet Ammon elos wi pac tuku liki siti nukewa selos , ac elos akola in mweun .
13019008	Ke David el lohng ma sikyak inge , el supwalla Joab ac mwet mweun lal nukewa .
13019009	Mwet Ammon elos fahsr som nu ke nien utyak nu Rabbah , siti fulat lalos , ac tu na akola we . Na tokosra su tuku in welulos ke mweun , elos som nu yen turangang ac akola pac we .
13019010	Joab el liye tuh mwet lokoalok lalos ac mweunelos meet ah me ac tokolos me . Ouinge el sulela mwet ma wo emeet ke mweun sin mwet Israel , ac oakelosi in lain mwet Syria .
13019011	Na el sang Abishai , tamulel lal , in kol mwet mweun lula nukewa , ac Abishai el oakelosi in lain mwet Ammon .
13019012	Joab el fahk nu sel , “ Kom fin liye tuh mwet Syria ac kutangyula , na kom tuku kasreyu , ac nga fin liye tuh mwet Ammon ac kutangkomla , na nga ac fahsrot kasrekom .
13019013	Kom in ku ac pulaik ! Lela kut in sang kuiyasr nufon in mweun ke mwet lasr ac ke siti nukewa lun God lasr . Finsrak tuh in fahsr ou ma lungse lun LEUM GOD ! ”
13019014	Joab ac mwet lal fahsryak nu meet in mweun , ac mwet Syria elos kaing .
13019015	Ke mwet Ammon elos liye lah mwet Syria kaing , na elos kaingkunul Abishai , ac foloki nu in siti uh . Na Joab el folokla nu Jerusalem .
13019016	Mwet Syria elos akilen lah mwet Israel elos kutangulosla , na elos use un mwet mweun Syria su muta layen kutulap in Infacl Euphrates , ac eisalosyang nu inpaol Shobach , captain lun un mwet mweun lal Tokosra Hadadezer lun Zobah .
13019017	Ke David el lohngak ma inge , el orani mwet mweun lun Israel ac tupalla Infacl Jordan , ac oakelosi in lain mwet Syria . Mweun uh srola ,
13019018	na mwet Israel elos ukwauk mwet mweun Syria . David ac mwet lal ah uniya mwet itkosr tausin su kasrusr ke chariot , ac angngaul tausin mwet kasrusr fin horse . Elos oayapa unilya Shobach , captain lun mwet mweun Syria ah .
13019019	Ke tokosra kewa su orekma nu sel Hadadezer elos akilen lah kutangyukla elos sin mwet Israel , na elos orek misla yorol David , ac mutawauk in orekma nu sel . Mwet Syria elos tia sifil lungse kasru mwet Ammon .
13020001	Yac tok ah , ke pacl sak uh mutawauk in srun tukun pacl in mihsrisr , ac tokosra uh wacna som mweun , Joab el us un mwet mweun ac som nu ke facl lun mwet Ammon . A Tokosra David el mutana Jerusalem . Na elos kuhlusya ac sruokya siti Rabbah , ac kunausla acn we .
13020002	Ma sruloala se lun mwet Ammon su pangpang Molech , oasr tefuro gold se kac , paun itngoul limekosr toasriya . Na oasr sie eot saok fin tefuro se inge , ac David el eisla ac filiya fin tefuro lal sifacna . El oayapa usla ma wap pukanten liki siti sac .
13020003	David el usla mwet in siti sac , ac oru tuh elos in orekma ke tahta , mwe pukpuk osra , ac tuhla . El oru ouinge nu sin mwet nukewa ma el sruokya ke siti lun mwet Ammon . Na el ac mwet lal folokla nu Jerusalem .
13020004	Tok , oasr pac mweun srola lain mwet Philistia in acn Gezer . Ma se inge sikyak ke pacl se Sibbecai , sie mwet Hushah , el unilya Sippai , mwet na yohk pisa se , ac mwet Philistia elos kutangyukla .
13020005	Na oasr pac sie mweun lain mwet Philistia , ac Elhanan wen natul Jair , el unilya Lahmi , tamulel lal Goliath , mwet Gath . Fungen osra natul Goliath a yohk oana sak ke mwe otwot nuknuk .
13020006	Sie pac mweun an tuh orek in acn Gath . Oasr mwet na yohk pisa se we ma oasr kufinpo onkosr ke paol kewa ac kufinnia onkosr ke nial kewa . Mwet se inge el ma in sou lun mwet yohk pisa emeet ah .
13020007	El funmwet nu sin mwet Israel , ac Jonathan wen natul Shammah , tamulel lal David , el unilya .
13020008	Mwet tolu inge su anwuki sel David ac mwet lal inge , elos ma nutin mwet yohk pisa lun acn Gath .
13021001	Satan el tuh lungse elan aklokoalokye mwet Israel , na pa el oru tuh David elan nunkeak elan oakla pisen mwet uh .
13021002	David el sapkin nu sel Joab ac mwet pwapa lal saya , “ Kowos fahla ac sasla nu in facl Israel nufon , mutawauk e epang me oatula safla eir , ac oakla pisen mwet uh . Nga lungse etu lah elos mwet ekasr nufon . ”
13021003	Na Joab el fahk , “ Finsrak LEUM GOD Elan oru tuh mwet Israel in puseni pacl siofok liki pisalos misenge ! Leum Fulat , elos nukewa mwet kulansap lom . Na efu ku kom lungsum in oru ma se inge , ac sang mwatan mutunfacl se inge nufon ? ”
13021004	Tusruktu , nunak lal tokosra ku lukel Joab , pwanang Joab el illa ac fahsr sasla in facl Israel nufon , na el folok nu Jerusalem .
13021005	El fahkak nu sel Tokosra David pisen mukul nukewa ma fal in wi mweun : oasr sie million siofok tausin mwet Israel , ac mwet angfoko itngoul tausin mwet Judah .
13021006	Ke sripen Joab el tiana insese nu ke sap se lal tokosra inge , el tiana oakla mwet in sruf lal Levi ac Benjamin .
13021007	God El tia insewowo ke ma orek inge , na pa El sang kai upa nu fin mwet Israel .
13021008	Ac David el fahk nu sin God , “ Nga orala ma koluk na yohk se . Nunak munas , sisla koluk luk . Ma na lalfon se pa nga orala . ”
13021009	Na LEUM GOD El fahk nu sel Gad , mwet palu lal David ,
13021010	“ Fahla fahk nu sel David lah nga fah sang nu sel ke mwe sulela tolu , ac el enenu in sulela sie . Nga ac fah oru ma se ma el ac sulela an . ”
13021011	Gad el som ac fahk nu sel David ma LEUM GOD El fahk , na el siyuk sel , “ Ma ya kac kom lungse uh ?
13021012	In oasr sracl fin facl sum ke yac tolu ? Ku kom in kaing liki un mwet mweun lun mwet lokoalok lom ke malem tolu ? Ku LEUM GOD Elan mweuni kom ke cutlass natul ac supwama mas upa , ac sie lipufan in use misa nu fin acn Israel nufon ke len tolu ? Mea nga ac fahk in topuk LEUM GOD ? ”
13021013	Na David el fahk nu sel Gad , “ Nga arulana fohsak ac nikinyula ! Tusruktu nga tia lungse ngan kalyeiyuk sin mwet uh . Lela in LEUM GOD na pa orek kaiyuk nu sesr , tuh El pakoten . ”
13021014	Na Leum GOD El supwala mas na upa se nu fin mwet Israel , ac mwet itngoul tausin selos misa .
13021015	Na El supwala sie lipufan in kunausla acn Jerusalem , tusruktu El sifil ekulla nunak lal ac fahk nu sin lipufan sac , “ Tui ! Tari fal ! ” Lipufan sac el tuyak ke acn in kulkul wheat lal Araunah , mwet Jebus .
13021016	David el liye lipufan sac ke el tu yen engyeng uh ac el sruok cutlass natul inpaol ac akola in kunausla acn Jerusalem . David ac mwet kol lun mwet Israel elos nokomang nuknuk in eoksra , ac elos srimi nwe ten ac mutalos pusral fin fohk uh .
13021017	Ac David el pre ac fahk , “ O God , nga pa oru ma koluk se inge . Nga pa sapkin in oaoala mwet uh . Mea mwet inge orala ? LEUM GOD luk , fal kom in kaiyu ac sou luk , ac fuhlela mwet lom inge . ”
13021018	Na lipufan lun LEUM GOD el fahk nu sel Gad elan sapkin nu sel David tuh elan som ac etoak sie loang in acn in kulkul wheat lal Araunah .
13021019	David el akos sap lun LEUM GOD acsom , oana ma Gad el tuh fahk nu sel .
13021020	Ke nien kulkul wheat ah , Araunah ac wen akosr natul elos muta kulkul wheat . Ke elos liye lipufan sac , wen ekasr ah kaing ac wikla .
13021021	Ke pacl se Araunah el liyalak Tokosra David ke el fahsru ac apkuranme , el som liki nien kulkul wheat uh , ac srimi nwe ten ac mutal pusral infohk uh .
13021022	David el fahk nu sel , “ Kukakunma nien kulkul wheat lom uh , tuh nga in etoak sie loang nu sin LEUM GOD , in tulokinya mas upa se orek inge . Nga lungse molela nufon . ”
13021023	Ac Araunah el fahk , “ O Tokosra , eis na lom ac orekmakin nu ke enenu lom . Cow mukul pa inge , kom ku in orek mwe kisa firir kac fin loang an , ac ipin sak ke acn in kulkul wheat uh ku in orekmakinyuk mwe etong , oayapa wheat tuh in mwe sang lom . Ma inge kewa nga sot nu sum . ”
13021024	Tusruktu tokosra el topuk , “ Mo , nga ac moli nufon ma inge . Nga ac tia kisakin nu sin LEUM GOD ma su ma lom , ma tuku nu sik ke wangin molo . ”
13021025	Na el sang ipin gold onfoko nu sel Araunah , molin acn in kulkul wheat sac .
13021026	David el etoak sie loang nu sin LEUM GOD we , ac kisakin mwe kisa firir , ac mwe kisa in akinsewowo . El pre , ac LEUM GOD El topuk pre lal , ac supweya e lucng me in akosak mwe kisa fin loang uh .
13021027	LEUM GOD El fahk nu sin lipufan sac tuh elan filiya cutlass natul ah , ac lipufan sac akos .
13021028	Ke David el liye ma inge el akilen lah LEUM GOD El topuk pre lal , na el oru mwe kisa lal fin loang uh ke acn in kulkul wheat lal Araunah .
13021029	Lohm Nuknuk sin LEUM GOD su Moses el tuh orala yen mwesis , oayapa loang se mwe kisa uh orek fac , srakna oan ke nien alu in acn Gibeon in pacl se inge .
13021030	Tusruktu David el tia ku in som alu nu sin God we , mweyen el sangeng ke cutlass se nutin lipufan lun LEUM GOD .
13022001	Ke ma inge David el fahk , “ Pa inge acn se ma Tempul lun LEUM GOD ac fah oan we . Pa inge loang se su mwet Israel ac tufah oru mwe kisa lalos fac . ”
13022002	Tokosra David el sap mwetsac nukewa su muta in facl Israel in toeni , ac el sang orekma kunalos . Kutu selos tufahl eot lulap in sang musai Tempul uh .
13022003	David el sap in utuku osra lulap mwe orek osra in patput ac osra in kapsreni polosak ke mutunpot , ac oayapa osra bronze na lulap — wangin mwet ku in etu toasriya .
13022004	El sap mwet Tyre ac mwet Sidon in use polosak cedar pukanten .
13022005	In nunak lal David el nunku mu , “ Tempul se su wen nutik Solomon el ac musai inge enenu in arulana oasku ac pwengpeng nu fin faclu nufon . Tuh inge el srakna fusr ac supah ke orekma , na pa nga enenu in akoo kufwen mwe orekma nukewa nu kac . ” Ouinge David el akoela kufwen sroasr puspis meet liki el misa .
13022006	El sapla solalma Solomon , wen natul , ac sapkin nu sel tuh elan musai sie tempul nu sin LEUM GOD lun Israel .
13022007	David el fahk nu sel , “ Wen nutik , nga tuh kena musaela sie tempul in akfulatye LEUM GOD luk .
13022008	Tusruktu , LEUM GOD El fahk nu sik lah pusle mwet nga uniya , ac pusle mweun nga oru . Na ke sripen yokla srah nga aksororyela , God El ac tia lela ngan musai sie tempul nu sel .
13022009	Tusruktu El oru sie wulela nu sik ac fahk , ‘ Ac fah oasr sie wen nutum su ac fah leum ke pacl in misla , mweyen nga ac fah akmisye inmasrlol ac mwet lokoalok lal . Inel ac fah pangpang Solomon , mweyen in pacl el leum , nga ac fah oru tuh mwet Israel in okak ac muta in misla .
13022010	El ac fah musai sie tempul nu sik . El ac fah wen nutik , ac nga ac fah papa tumal . Fwilin tulik natul ac fah tokosra fin mwet Israel ma pahtpat . ’ ”
13022011	Na David el sifilpa fahk , “ Wen nutik , lela tuh LEUM GOD lom in wi kom , ac finsrak in pwaye wulela lal keim tuh kom in ku in musaela sie tempul nu sel .
13022012	Oayapa lela tuh LEUM GOD lom Elan asot etauk ac lalmwetmet nu sum , tuh kom fah ku in kol mwet Israel fal nu ke ma sap lal .
13022013	Kom fin akos ma sap nukewa ma LEUM GOD El sang nu sel Moses in kol mwet Israel , na kom ac fah kapkapak in ma wo . Kom in ku ac pulaik . Nikmet sangeng ke kutena ma .
13022014	Ac funu nu ke Tempul uh , sahp sun akosr tausin tuhn in gold oayapa apkuran angngaul tausin tuhn in silver nga sifacna fosrngakin in sang musaela . Sayen ma ingan , arulana pukanten osra bronze ac iron akoeyuk pac tari . Nga orala pac in oasr sak ac eot , tuh kom fah enenu in sifil sokak ma inge in weang pac .
13022015	Pukanten mwet orekma lom . Oasr mwet in tufahl eot , ac mwet orekma ke cement ac mwet sroasr , oayapa pus mwet usrnguk ke kain in orekma nukewa
13022016	ke gold , silver , bronze , ac iron . Inge kom in mutawauk ke orekma se inge , ac lela tuh LEUM GOD Elan wi kom . ”
13022017	David el sapkin nu sin mwet kol nukewa in Israel tuh elos in kasrel Solomon .
13022018	El fahk mu , “ LEUM GOD lowos El tuh wi kowos in pacl e nukewa , ac El oru tuh in oasr misla yen nukewa apunla facl suwos . El oru tuh nga in ku in kutangla mwet nukewa su muta in acn inge meet , ac inge elos muta ye pouwos ac ye poun LEUM GOD .
13022019	Inge kowos in kulansupu LEUM GOD lowos ke insiowos kewa ac ke ngunuwos kewa . Kowos in mutawauk musai Tempul an , tuh kowos in ku in filiya Tuptup in Wuleang lun LEUM GOD loac , oayapa ma mutal nukewa ma orekmakinyuk ke pacl kowos alu nu sel . ”
13023001	Ke David el matuoh el oru tuh Solomon , wen natul , elan tokosra fin Israel .
13023002	Tokosra David el pangoneni mwet kol nukewa lun mwet Israel , oayapa mwet tol ac mwet Levi .
13023003	El oakla pisen mukul nukewa sin mwet Levi su oasr ke yac tolngoulyak , ac sun mwet tolngoul oalkosr tausin .
13023004	Na tokosra el sulela longoul akosr tausin sin mwet inge in fosrngakin orekma lun Tempul , ac onkosr tausin in karingin ma simusla nukewa , oayapa nununku fohsak inmasrlon mwet uh ,
13023005	akosr tausin in mwet topang , ac akosr tausin in kaksakin LEUM GOD ke mwe on ma tokosra el sang nu selos in orekmakin nu ke sripa se inge .
13023006	Tokosra David el kitalik mwet Levi nu ke u tolu , fal nu ke sou lulap inge : Gershon , Kohath , ac Merari .
13023007	Oasr wen luo natul Gershon : elos pa Ladan ac Shimei .
13023008	Oasr wen tolu natul Ladan : elos pa Jehiel , Zetham , ac Joel ,
13023009	ac elos sifen sou ke fwil natul Ladan . ( Oasr wen tolu natul Shimei : Shelomoth , Haziel , ac Haran . )
13023010	Oasr wen akosr natul Shimei , ac pa inge inelos , takla fal nu ke matwalos : Jahath , Zina , Jeush , ac Beriah .
13023011	Tia pus wen natul Jeush ac Beriah , na pa elos oaoala oana sou sefanna .
13023012	Oasr wen akosr natul Kohath : elos pa Amram , Izhar , Hebron , ac Uzziel .
13023013	Amram el wounse , ac el pa papa tumal Aaron ac Moses . ( Aaron ac fwil natul elos sriyukla in karinganang ma mutal ke Tempul ma pahtpat , oayapa elos in akosak mwe kisa keng ke pacl in alu nu sin LEUM GOD , ac kulansupwal , ac akinsewowoye mwet uh Inel .
13023014	Tusruktu wen natul Moses [ mwet se su pangpang mwet lun God ] elos oaoa in mwet Levi . )
13023015	Oasr wen luo natul Moses : elos pa Gershom ac Eliezer .
13023016	Inmasrlon wen natul Gershom , Shebuel pa mwet kol selos uh .
13023017	Wen sefanna natul Eliezer : el pa Rehabiah , ac pukanten mwet in fwil natul Rehabiah .
13023018	Izhar , wen se akluo natul Kohath , oasr wen se natul : inel pa Shelomith , su el pa sifen sou sac .
13023019	Hebron , wen se aktolu natul Kohath , oasr wen akosr natul : elos pa Jeriah , Amariah , Jahaziel , ac Jekameam .
13023020	Uzziel , wen se akakosr natul Kohath , oasr wen luo natul : elos pa Micah ac Isshiah .
13023021	Oasr wen luo natul Merari : elos pa Mahli ac Mushi . Oasr pac wen luo natul Mahli : elos pa Eleazar ac Kish ,
13023022	tusruktu Eleazar el misa ac wangin wen natul , a acn mukena . Acn natul inge elos payuk sin wen natul Kish , su ma wien papa tumaltal .
13023023	Mushi , wen se akluo natul Merari , oasr wen tolu natul : elos pa Mahli , Eder , ac jeremoth .
13023024	Pa ingan fwil natul Levi , ac kais sie selos simla inelos fal nu ke takin sou lalos . Na elos nukewa su yac longoulyak oasr ip kunalos ke orekma in Tempul lun LEUM GOD .
13023025	David el fahk , “ LEUM GOD lun Israel El sang misla nu sin mwet lal , ac El ac fah sifacna muta in Jerusalem ma pahtpat .
13023026	Ke ma inge , mwet Levi elos tia sifil enenu in us Lohm Nuknuk sin LEUM GOD ac ma orekmakinyuk ke pacl in alu . ”
13023027	Ke sripen oakwuk safla lal David inge , mwet Levi nukewa elos enenu in simla inelos ac akola nu ke moul in kulansap ke elos sun yac longoul .
13023028	Orekma kunalos pa inge : in kasru mwet tol ke fwil natul Aaron ke pacl in alu , in karinganang inkalkal lun Tempul ac infukil nukewa we , ac taran tuh ma mutal nukewa in nasnas ac tia fohkfok .
13023029	Ma kunalos pac in akoo bread ma kisakinyuk nu sin God , ac flao ma orekmakinyuk ke mwe kisa , ku lof srisrik wangin mwe pulol kac , ac mwe kisa manman , ac flao ma kulamisyuk ke oil in olive , oayapa elos pa srikeya ac pauni mwe sang nukewa ma utuku nu in Tempul uh .
13023030	Elos pa oru on in kaksak nu sin LEUM GOD ke lotutang ac eku nukewa ,
13023031	oayapa ke pacl nukewa ma mwe kisa firir orek nu sin LEUM GOD ke len Sabbath , ke Malem Sasu , ac ke kufwa saya . Oasr ma sap oakwuki in fahkak pisen mwet Levi ma eneneyuk nu ke orekma inge ke kais sie pacl . Ma kunen mwet Levi in karingin pacl in alu nu sin LEUM GOD nwe tok .
13023032	Elos pa karinganang Lohm Nuknuk sin LEUM GOD oayapa Tempul , ac elos pa kasru mwet tol wialos in fwil natul Aaron , ke pacl in alu in Tempul .
13024001	Pa inge u ma tuku ke fita lal Aaron . Oasr wen akosr natul Aaron : elos pa Nadab , Abihu , Eleazar , ac Ithamar .
13024002	Nadab ac Abihu eltal misa meet liki papa tumaltal , ac wangin tulik natultal , na pa Eleazar ac Ithamar eltal mwet tol .
13024003	Tokosra David el oakiya wen natul Aaron nu ke kais sie u , fal nu ke orekma kunalos . Mwet luo ma kasrel ke oakwuk se inge pa Zadok in fwil natul Eleazar , ac Ahimelech in fwil natul Ithamar .
13024004	Mwet in fwil natul Eleazar elos oakwuki nu ke u singoul onkosr , ac mwet in fwil natul Ithamar elos oakwuki nu ke u oalkosr . Orek ouinge ke sripen pus mukul su sifen sou in fwil natul Eleazar .
13024005	In fwil natul Eleazar ac fwil natul Ithamar kewa , oasr mwet pwapa nu ke orekma lun Tempul oayapa mwet kol ke moul in ngun , na pa elos eis kunalos ke susfa .
13024006	Mwet in fwil natul Eleazar ac natul Ithamar elos kais sie fahsr susfa . Na toko simla inelos yurin mwet sim lun mwet Levi , su el pa Shemaiah wen natul Nethanel . Mwet loh ke ma inge pa tokosra ac mwet pwapa lal , oayapa Zadok mwet tol , Ahimelech wen natul Abiathar , ac sifen sou lun mwet tol , ac sifen sou lun mwet Levi .
13024007	Fa se meet an oayang nu sel Jehoiarib , akluo nu sel Jedaiah ,
13024008	aktolu nu sel Harim , akakosr nu sel Seorim ,
13024009	aklimekosr nu sel Malchijah , akonkosr nu sel Mijamin ,
13024010	akitkosr nu sel Hakkoz , akoalkosr nu sel Abijah ,
13024011	akeu nu sel Jeshua , aksingoul nu sel Shecaniah ,
13024012	aksingoul sie nu sel Eliashib , aksingoul luo nu sel Jakim ,
13024013	aksingoul tolu nu sel Huppah , aksingoul akosr nu sel Jeshebeab ,
13024014	aksingoul limekosrnu sel Bilgah , aksingoul onkosr nu sel Immer ,
13024015	aksingoul itkosr nu sel Hezir , aksingoul oalkosr nu sel Happizzez ,
13024016	aksingoul eu nu sel Pethahiah , aklongoul nu sel Jehezkel ,
13024017	aklongoul sie nu sel Jachin , aklongoul luo nu sel Gamul ,
13024018	aklongoul tolu nu sel Delaiah , ac aklongoul akosr nu sel Maaziah .
13024019	Simla inen mwet inge fal nu ke kunokon ma itukyang nu selos in kulansap lalos in tempul . Ma inge oakiyuki nu selos sel Aaron , papa matu tumalos , ke el akos ma LEUM GOD lun Israel El sapkin .
13024020	Pa inge kutu pac sifen sou ke fita lal Levi : Jehdeiah , fita natul Amram kacl Shebuel ;
13024021	Isshiah , fita natul Rehabiah ;
13024022	Jahath , fita natul Izhar kacl Shelomith ;
13024023	Jeriah , Amariah , Jehaziel , ac Jekameam , wen natul Hebron , takla fal nu ke matwalos ;
13024024	Shamir , fita natul Uzziel kacl Micah ;
13024025	Zechariah , fita natul Uzziel kacl Isshiah , tamulel lal Micah ;
13024026	Mahli , Mushi , ac Jaaziah , fita natul Merari .
13024027	Oasr wen tolu natul Jaaziah : elos pa Shoham , Zaccur , ac Ibri .
13024028	Oasr wen luo natul Mahli : sie pa Eleazar , tuh wangin wen natul ,
13024029	ac sie pa Kish , su wen natul pa Jerahmeel .
13024030	Oasr wen tolu natul Mushi : elos pa Mahli , Eder , ac Jeremoth . Pa ingan mwet in sou lun mwet Levi .
13024031	Kais sie sifen sou , wi sie sin tamulel fusr lal , elos ac susfa nu ke kunokon lalos , in oana ke sou lalos kacl Aaron elos tuh oru . Ac Tokosra David , Zadok , Ahimelech , ac kais sie sifen sou lun mwet tol ke sruf Levi elos tuh mwet loh kac .
13025001	Tokosra David ac mwet kol lun mwet Levi elos sulela kutu sin sou lal Levi tuh elos in kol ke pacl in alu . Mwet in sou lal Asaph , Heman , ac Jeduthun pa mwet in fahkak ke kas lun God , wi pusren mwe on ke harp ac cymbal . Pa inge takin mwet ma solla in karingin pacl in alu , wi orekma kunalos kais sie :
13025002	Wen akosr natul Asaph : Zaccur , Joseph , Nethaniah , ac Asharelah . Elos muta ye koko lal Asaph , su fahkak kas lun God ke pacl ma tokosra el sapkin .
13025003	Wen onkosr natul Jeduthun : Gedaliah , Zeri , Jeshaiah , Shimei , Hashabiah , ac Mattithiah . Elos muta ye koko lun papa tumalos in fahkak kas lun God wi pusren mwe on ke harp , ac elos onkakin on in kaksak ac sang kulo nu sin LEUM GOD .
13025004	Wen singoul akosr natul Heman : Bukkiah , Mattaniah , Uzziel , Shebuel , Jerimoth , Hananiah , Hanani , Eliathah , Giddalti , Romamti Ezer , Joshbekashah , Mallothi , Hothir , ac Mahazioth .
13025005	God El tuh sang nu sel Heman , mwet liyaten lun tokosra , wen singoul akosr inge oayapa acn tolu oana El tuh wulela kac , tuh in sang ku nu sel Heman .
13025006	Wen nukewa natul elos mwet srital ke cymbal ac harp ye koko lun papa tumalos ke pacl in alu in Tempul . Asaph , Jeduthun , ac Heman elos orekma ye koko lal tokosra .
13025007	Mwet longoul akosr inge kewa mwet na pisrla ke on . Mwet Levi wialos elos mwet lutlut on ac pah in srital ke mwe on — mukul luofoko oalngoul oalkosr nufon .
13025008	Mwet inge nukewa elos susfa in koneak kunokon lalos , finne elos matu ku fusr , finne mwet pah ku mwet tufahna lutlut .
13025009	Fa se emeet oayang nu sel Joseph in sou lal Asaph . Akluo nu sel Gedaliah wi tamulel lal ac wen natul , mukul singoul luo .
13025010	Aktolu nu sel Zaccur wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025011	Akakosr nu sel Izri wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025012	Aklimekosr nu sel Nethaniah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025013	Akonkosr nu sel Bukkiah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025014	Akitkosr nu sel Jesarelah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025015	Akoalkosr nu sel Jeshaiah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025016	Akeu nu sel Mattaniah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025017	Aksingoul nu sel Shimei wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025018	Aksingoul sie nu sel Azarel wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025019	Aksingoul luo nu sel Hashabiah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025020	Aksingoul tolu nu sel Shubael wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025021	Aksingoul akosr nu sel Mattithiah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025022	Aksingoul limekosr nu sel Jeremoth wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025023	Aksingoul onkosr nu sel Hananiah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025024	Aksingoul itkosr nu sel Joshbekashah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025025	Aksingoul oalkosr nu sel Hanani wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025026	Aksingoul eu nu sel Mallothi wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025027	Aklongoul nu sel Eliathah wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025028	Aklongoul sie nu sel Hothir wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025029	AklongouI luo nu sel Giddalti wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025030	Aklongoul tolu nu sel Mahazioth wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13025031	Aklongoul akosr nu sel Romamti Ezer wi wen natul ac tamulel lal , mukul singoul luo .
13026001	Pa inge kunokon ma itukyang nu sin mwet Levi su oru orekma in topang ke Tempul . Ke sruf lal Korah , Meshelemiah , wen natul Kore , su ma in sou lal Asaph .
13026002	Oasr wen itkosr natul , ac pa inge inelos , takla fal nu ke matwalos : Zechariah , Jediael , Zebadiah , Jathniel ,
13026003	Elam , Jehohanan , ac Eliehoenai .
13026004	Oayapa Obed Edom , su God El akinsewowoyal ac sang wen oalkosr natul . Pa inge inelos , takla fal nu ke matwalos : Shemaiah , Jehozabad , Joah , Sachar , Nethanel ,
13026005	Ammiel , Issachar , ac Peullethai .
13026006	Shemaiah , wen se meet natul Obed Edom , oasr wen natul su yohk sripa nu ke sou lalos mweyen elos ku ac pulaik .
13026007	Elos pa Othni , Rephael , Obed , Elzabad , Elihu , ac Semachiah . Elihu ac Semachiah eltal mwet na pisrla inmasrlolos .
13026008	In sou lal Obed Edom oasr mukul onngoul luo su arulana fas nu ke orekma se inge .
13026009	In sou lal Meshelemiah oasr mukul singoul oalkosr ma ku ac fas in kulansap .
13026010	Hosah , ke sruf lal Merari , oasr wen akosr natul : elos pa Shimri ( papa tumal el sang tuh el pa leumi sou sacn finne tia el pa matu ) ,
13026011	Hilkiah , Tebaliah , ac Zechariah . Oasr mwet singoul tolu nufon in sou lal Hosah su mwet topang ke Tempul .
13026012	Kitakatelik mwet topang ke Tempul nu ke u , fal nu ke sou lalos , ac itukyang orekma kunalos ke Tempul oana mwet Levi saya .
13026013	Kais sie sou , finne srik ku yohk , elos susfa lah su ac taran kais sie mutunpot inge .
13026014	Shelemiah el sukya fa tuh el pa ac taran mutunpot se oan nu kutulap , ac Zechariah ( wen natul , su pacl nukewa kas in kasru lal uh arulana wo ) el sukya fa tuh el pa taran mutunpot se nu epang .
13026015	Obed Edom el sukya fa nu ke mutunpot se nu eir , ac wen natul elos sukya fa tuh elos pa taran iwen filma .
13026016	Itukyang nu sel Shuppim ac Hosah mutunpot se nu roto oayapa Mutunpot Shallecheth , su oan inkanek soko lucng ah . Orekma lun mwet taran mutunpot inge oakwuki nu ke kais sie u . Fin tari sie u ah , na u se toko ac mutawauk .
13026017	Len nukewa oasr mwet topang onkosr layen nu kutulap , akosr nu epang , ac akosr nu eir . Mwet topang akosr pac tu sisken iwen filma ke len nukewa , kais luo ke acn se .
13026018	Apkuran nu ke sawalsrisr se nu roto , oasr mwet topang akosr tu sisken inkanek uh , ac luo ke sawalsrisr sac .
13026019	Pa ingankunokon ma itukyang nu sin sou lal Korah ac sou lal Merari ke ip lun mwet topang .
13026020	Kutu sin mwet wialos in sruf lal Levi pa karingin nien mwe kasrup ke Tempul , oayapa infukil in karinganang ma kisakinyukla nu sin God .
13026021	Sie sin wen natul Gershon pa Ladan , su papa matu tumun sou pukanten , weang pacna sou ma tuku kacl Jehiel , wen se natul .
13026022	Oasr pac wen luo saya natul Ladan : elos pa Zetham ac Joel . Eltal pa karinganang nien mwe kasrup ac nien fwilma ke Tempul .
13026023	Oasr pac kunokon itukyang nu sin fwilin tulik natul Amram , Izhar , Hebron , ac Uzziel .
13026024	Shebuel , sie mwet in sou lal Gershom natul Moses , el pa mwet kol fulat in karingin mwe kasrup nukewa lun Tempul .
13026025	Eliezer , tamulel lal Gershom , el sosou lal Shebuel , ke sripen Eliezer el papa tumal Rehabiah , papa tumal Jeshiah , papa tumal Joram , papa tumal Zichri , papa tumal Shelomith .
13026026	Shelomith ac mwet in sou lal pa karingin mwe lung nukewa ma kisakinyuk nu sin God sel Tokosra David , ac sin mwet kol in kais sie sou ac kais sie sruf , oayapa sin leum lun un mwet mweun .
13026027	Mwet inge elos usla kutu ma wap ma elos sruokya ke mweun , ac kisakunang tuh in orekmakinyuk ke Tempul .
13026028	Shelomith ac sou lal pa liyaung ma nukewa ma kisakinyukla in orekmakinyuk in Tempul uh . Kutu ma inge pa mwe sang sel Samuel mwet palu , ac mwe sang sel Tokosra Saul , ac sel Abner wen natul Ner , ac sel Joab wen natul Zeruiah .
13026029	Chenaniah ac wen natul , su ma in fwilin tulik natul Izhar , itukyang orekma fulat inge kunalos : in karinganang ma simla , oayapa in akmisye fohs inmasrlon mwet Israel .
13026030	lnmasrlon fwilin tulik natul Hebron , Hashabiah wi sie tausin itfoko mwet in sou lal , elos nukewa mwet na fas , itukyang tuh elos in liyaung oakwuk nukewa ke ip lun alu nu sin LEUM GOD , oayapa oakwuk nu ke ip lun office lun mwet Israel su muta layen nu roto in Infacl Jordan .
13026031	Jeriah pa mwet kol lun fwilin tulik natul Hebron . In yac se akangngaul ma David el tokosra , oasr sukok se orek nu sin fwilin tulik natul Hebron , na koneyukyak lah oasr mwet pwengpeng ke mweun in sou se inge su muta in acn Jazer in facl Gilead .
13026032	Tokosra David el sulela luo tausin itfoko mwet na fas su sifen kais sie sou ke sou lal Jeriah , ac sang tuh elos in karingin oakwuk nukewa ke ip lun alu ac ip lun office in acn Israel layen kutulap in Infacl Jordan , ke acn lun mwet in sruf lal Reuben , Gad , ac Tafun Manasseh Kutulap .
13027001	Pa inge takin mwet Israel su mwet kol ke kais sie sou ac ota , wi mwet pwapa lalos su oru orekma in karingin tokosrai uh . Kitakatelik mwet kol inge nu ke u singoul luo , fal nu ke malem singoul luo in yac se . Pisen mwet ke kais sie u inge pa mwet longoul akosr tausin , na kais sie u ac muta ye koko lun kais sie captain lun un mwet mweun .
13027002	Jashobeam , wen natul Zabdiel , pa karingin u se ke malem se meet . Oasr mwet longoul akosr tausin in u sac .
13027003	El ma ke fwil in tulik natul Perez , ac el pa sifen mwet kol lun mwet mweun nukewa nu ke malem se meet .
13027004	Dodai , sie mwet in fwil natul Ahohi , pa karingin u se ke malem akluo . Oasr pac mwet longoul akosr tausin in u sac . Mikloth pa akluo yal ke u se inge .
